contest-event.event-date:
June 1, 1914 D Llandovery Contest (Class B)
Llandovery Contest (Class B) 30 Test Piece Contest Llandovery Contest llandovery-contest-class-b
The Troubadour
Llandovery, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Prizes: £10, £5, £2 Following a protest over Blaengwynfi Band playing some professionals, Calfaria Band was later awarded the 1st prize. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 21, 2014, 7:32 p.m. Oct. 3, 2018, 12:46 p.m.
1 Aber-Blaengwynfi Silver D. J. Stevens
2 Calfaria Clydach T. J. Jones
3 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Ben Jones
Unknown Result Pontyates Llewellyn Thomas
Unknown Result Llanelli Band David Williams
